Reviews.Title: “budget hotel without drinking water”
Reviews.Author: drbsbhatia
Reviews.Content: stayed fragrance sunflower nights staff rude especially receptionist night duty check hour booked online provides 2 glass drinking water 250 ml dayyou request extra provide repeated requests threatening charged hotel provide 2 bottles drinking water hot singapore
